MS MCQs

    Receive data with Azure Data Share and transforming with Azure Data Factory

    »

    1. What is a logical grouping of activities in Azure Data Factory?

      Linked Service.

      Pipeline.

      Sink.


    2. When is it possible to add or remove datasets if created with Azure Data Share?

      It is possible to add or remove datasets within Azure Data Share after it has been created.

      It is only possible to remove or add datasets before it’s sent within Azure Data Share.

      It is not possible to add or remove datasets if created with Azure Data Share.


    3. What should be done when a connector in data factory is not supported in mapping data flow in order to transform data from one of these sources?

      Use an aggregate transformation in Dataflow.

      Use a group by activity in Dataflow.

      Ingest the data into a supported source using the copy activity.
